message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I think it could really benefit your business.  To start the conversation, I'm offering it at $1,100,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $950,000.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could come down to $1,050,000. I believe that's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering our previous discussion, I would like to propose an offer of $1,000,000.
